useCase.name: Remove Audio Effect
useCase.description: User wants to remove an audio effect from the audio controller.

mainSequence.step: User selects the option to remove an audio effect.
Dropdown handles the request to remove the effect.
AudioEffectAction triggers the removal of the effect.
AudioEffectSaga initiates the removal of the effect through a saga.
AudioController removes the effect from the audio.
AudioEffectAction completes the removal of the effect.
